actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: Expressing the appreciation of the House of Representatives for Robert E. Wallace, retiring Executive Director of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States, Washington Office.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: This resolution celebrates the leadership, guidance, and friendship of Robert E. Wallace as the Executive Director of the Veterans of Foreign Wars Washington Office for the past 23 years and wishes him the best in his retirement.

titles.title: Expressing the appreciation of the House of Representatives for Robert E. Wallace, retiring Executive Director of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States, Washington Office.
Expressing the appreciation of the House of Representatives for Robert E. Wallace, retiring Executive Director of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States, Washington Office.
